dateAndTimeOfPreparation.title: Date and Time of Preparation
dateAndTimeOfPreparation.description: Date and time of preparation of the interchange.

interchangeControlReference.description: Unique reference assigned by the sender to an interchange.
interchangeControlReference.title: Interchange Control Reference

interchangeRecipient.title: Interchange Recipient
interchangeRecipient.description: Identification of the Recipient of the interchange.

partnerIdentificationCodeQualifier.description: Version number of the syntax identified in the syntax identifier (0001).
partnerIdentificationCodeQualifier.title: Partner Identification Code Qualifier

recipientIdentification.description: Name or coded representation of the recipient of a data interchange.
recipientIdentification.title: Recipient Identification

interchangeSender.title: Interchange Sender
interchangeSender.description: Identification of the sender of the interchange.

partnerIdentificationCodeQualifier.description: Version number of the syntax identified in the syntax identifier (0001).
partnerIdentificationCodeQualifier.title: Partner Identification Code Qualifier

senderIdentification.description: Name or coded representation of the sender of a data interchange.
senderIdentification.title: Sender Identification

syntax.title: SYNTAX
syntax.description: Identification of the agency controlling the syntax and indication of syntax level.

syntaxIdentifier.description: Coded identification of the agency controlling a syntax and syntax level used in an interchange.
syntaxIdentifier.title: Syntax Identifier

syntaxTypeVersionNumber.description: Version number of the syntax identified in the syntax identifier (0001).
syntaxTypeVersionNumber.title: Syntax Type Version Number

messageHeader.title: Message Header
messageHeader.description: A service segment starting and uniquely identifying a message.

messageReferenceNumber.description: Unique message reference assigned by the sender.
messageReferenceNumber.title: MESSAGE REFERENCE NUMBER

messageIdentifier.title: MESSAGE IDENTIFIER
messageIdentifier.description: Identification of the type, version, etc. of the message being interchanged.

messageType.description: Code identifying a type of message and assigned by its controlling agency.
messageType.title: Message type

messageVersionNumber.description: Version number of a message type.
messageVersionNumber.title: Message version number

messageReleaseNumber.description: Release number within the current message version number.
messageReleaseNumber.title: Message release number

associationAssignedCode.description: Code, assigned by the association responsible for the design and maintenance of the message type concerned, which further identifies the message.
associationAssignedCode.title: Association assigned code

commonAccessReference.description: Reference serving as a key to relate all subsequent transfers of data to the same business case or file.
commonAccessReference.title: COMMON ACCESS REFERENCE

beginningOfMessage.title: Beginning Of Message
beginningOfMessage.description: A segment to indicate the type and function of the message and to transmit the identifying number.

documentName.title: DOCUMENT NAME
documentName.description: Identification of a type of document/message by code or name. Code preferred.

codeListIdentificationCode.description: Code identifying a user or association maintained code list.
codeListIdentificationCode.title: Code list identification code

codeListResponsibleAgencyCode.description: Code specifying the agency responsible for a code list.
codeListResponsibleAgencyCode.title: Code list responsible agency code

dateTimePeriod1.title: DATE/TIME/PERIOD
dateTimePeriod1.description: Date and/or time, or period relevant to the specified date/time/period type.

dateOrTimeOrPeriodFunctionCodeQualifier.description: Code qualifying the function of a date, time or period: '97' Transaction creation date.
dateOrTimeOrPeriodFunctionCodeQualifier.title: Date or time or period function code qualifier

dateOrTimeOrPeriodText.description: The value of a date, a date and time, a time or of a period in a specified representation.
dateOrTimeOrPeriodText.title: Date or time or period text

dateOrTimeOrPeriodFormatCode.description: Code specifying the representation of a date, time or period: '201' YYMMDDHHMM
dateOrTimeOrPeriodFormatCode.title: Date or time or period format code

messageFunctionCode.description: Code indicating the function of the message. Ommited.
messageFunctionCode.title: MESSAGE FUNCTION CODE

referenceIdentifier.description: Reference number: House AWB Serial Number.
referenceIdentifier.title: Reference identifier

dateTimePeriod2.title: DATE/TIME/PERIOD
dateTimePeriod2.description: Date and/or time, or period relevant to the specified date/time/period type.

dateOrTimeOrPeriodFunctionCodeQualifier.description: Code qualifying the function of a date, time or period: '50' date/time
dateOrTimeOrPeriodFunctionCodeQualifier.title: Date or time or period function code qualifier

dateOrTimeOrPeriodText.description: The value of a date, a date and time, a time or of a period in a specified representation: Date/time of status 1.
dateOrTimeOrPeriodText.title: Date or time or period text

dateOrTimeOrPeriodFormatCode.description: Code specifying the representation of a date, time or period: '201' YYMMDDHHMM
dateOrTimeOrPeriodFormatCode.title: Date or time or period format code

responseTypeCode.description: Code specifying the type of acknowledgment required or transmitted. Ommited.
responseTypeCode.title: RESPONSE TYPE CODE

generalIndicator1.title: General Indicator
generalIndicator1.description: A segment to indicate the processing indicator.

processingIndicatorCoded.description: Processing indicator code: 'S2Y' if Status 2 granted or 'S2N' if Status 2 revoked
processingIndicatorCoded.title: Processing Indicator Coded

generalIndicator2.title: General Indicator
generalIndicator2.description: A segment to indicate the processing indicator.

processingIndicatorCoded.description: Processing indicator code: Shipment description code (T,M,C or E).
processingIndicatorCoded.title: Processing Indicator Coded

generalIndicator3.title: General Indicator
generalIndicator3.description: A segment to indicate the processing indicator.

processingIndicatorCoded.description: Processing indicator code: Community Handling Code.
processingIndicatorCoded.title: Processing Indicator Coded

codeListQualifier.description: Code list qualifier: '131' special handling procedures.
codeListQualifier.title: Code list qualifier

detailsOfTransport.title: Details of Transport
detailsOfTransport.description: A segment to indicate the details of the transport.

codeListResponsibleAgency.description: Code list responsible agency coded: '3' IATA.
codeListResponsibleAgency.title: Code List Responsible Agency Coded

dateTimePeriod.title: DATE/TIME/PERIOD
dateTimePeriod.description: Date and/or time, or period relevant to the specified date/time/period type.

dateOrTimeOrPeriodFunctionCodeQualifier.description: Code qualifying the function of a date, time or period: '178' Arrival date/time actual.
dateOrTimeOrPeriodFunctionCodeQualifier.title: Date or time or period function code qualifier

dateOrTimeOrPeriodText.description: The value of a date, a date and time, a time or of a period in a specified representation: Year, Month & Day of Arrival.
dateOrTimeOrPeriodText.title: Date or time or period text

dateOrTimeOrPeriodFormatCode.description: Code specifying the representation of a date, time or period: '101' YYMMDD.
dateOrTimeOrPeriodFormatCode.title: Date or time or period format code

placeIdentification.title: Name And Address
placeIdentification.description: A segment to specify the place and location of the goods.

placeLocationIdentification.description: Place/location identification: Airport of arrival code.
placeLocationIdentification.title: Place/location identification

codeListQualifierAirport.description: Code specifying the identity of a party: '145' Airport/City code
codeListQualifierAirport.title: Code list identifier

codeListResponsibleAgencyCoded.description: Code list responsible agency coded: '3' IATA
codeListResponsibleAgencyCoded.title: Code List Responsible Agency Coded

subLocationIdentification.description: Sub location identification: Cargo Terminal Operator ID
subLocationIdentification.title: Sub location identification

codeListResponsibleAgencyCodedWarehouse.description: Code list responsible agency coded: 'ZZZ' Mutually defined.
codeListResponsibleAgencyCodedWarehouse.title: Code List Responsible Agency Coded

placeLocationIdentification.description: Place/location Identification: Airport/City of origin code
placeLocationIdentification.title: Place/location Identification

codeListResponsibleAgencyCoded.description: Code list responsible agency coded: '3' IATA.
codeListResponsibleAgencyCoded.title: Code List Responsible Agency Coded

locationIdentificationPlaceOfDestination.title: PARTY IDENTIFICATION DETAILS
locationIdentificationPlaceOfDestination.description: Identification of a transaction party by code.

placeLocationQualifier.description: Place/location qualifier: '85' Transport Contract place of destination
placeLocationQualifier.title: Place/location qualifier

placeLocationIdentification.description: Place/location identification: Airport of destination code.
placeLocationIdentification.title: Place/location identification

codeListQualifierAirport.description: Code specifying the identity of a party: '145' Airport/City code
codeListQualifierAirport.title: Code list identifier

codeListResponsibleAgencyCoded.description: Code list responsible agency coded: '3' IATA
codeListResponsibleAgencyCoded.title: Code List Responsible Agency Coded

subLocationIdentification.description: Sub location identification: Cargo Terminal Operator ID
subLocationIdentification.title: Sub location identification

codeListResponsibleAgencyCodedWarehouse.description: Code list responsible agency coded: 'ZZZ' Mutually defined.
codeListResponsibleAgencyCodedWarehouse.title: Code List Responsible Agency Coded

nameAndAddress.title: Name And Address
nameAndAddress.description: A segment to specify the name and address of the customs broker.

partyFunctionCodeQualifier.description: Code giving specific meaning to a party: 'CB' Customs Broker.
partyFunctionCodeQualifier.title: Party Qualifier

partyIdentificationDetails.title: Party Identification Details
partyIdentificationDetails.description: Identification of a transaction party by code.

partyIdentifier.description: Code specifying the identity of a party: Broker/Consolidator code
partyIdentifier.title: Party identifier

goodItemsDetails.title: Good Items Details
goodItemsDetails.description: A segment to indicate the details of the good items in the shipment.

freeTextItems.title: Free Text Items
freeTextItems.description: Items:  A segment to specify free form or processable supplementary information related to the whole message. In computer-to- computer exchanges free form text will normally require the receiver to process this segment manually.

textSubjectCodeQualifier.description: Code qualifying the subject of the text: 'AAA' Description of Goods.
textSubjectCodeQualifier.title: Text Subject Code Qualifier

freeTextFunctionCode.description: Code specifying the function of free text. Ommited.
freeTextFunctionCode.title: Free Text Function Code

textReference.title: Text Reference
textReference.description: Coded reference to a standard text and its source. Ommited.

freeText.description: Free form text: Manifest Description of Goods.
freeText.title: Free text

quantityManifested.title: Quantity Manifested
quantityManifested.description: A segment to indicate the quantity manifested.

quantityReceived.title: Quantity Received
quantityReceived.description: A segment to indicate the quantity received.

measurements.title: Measurements
measurements.description: A segment to indicate the processing indicator.

reference.title: Reference
reference.description: A segment to indicate the reference number of the document/message.

referenceCodeQualifier.description: Code qualifying a reference: 'HS' Harmonised System Number.
referenceCodeQualifier.title: Reference code qualifier

referenceIdentifier.description: Identifies a reference: Harmonised Commodity Code.
referenceIdentifier.title: Reference identifier

messageTrailer.title: Message Trailer
messageTrailer.description: A service segment ending a message, giving the total number of segments in the message (including the UNH & UNT) and the control reference number of the message.

numberOfSegmentsInAMessage.description: The number of segments in a message body, plus the message header segment and message trailer segment.
numberOfSegmentsInAMessage.title: Number of Segments in a Message

messageReferenceNumber.description: Unique message reference assigned by the sender: identical to 0062 in UNH.
messageReferenceNumber.title: Message Reference Number

interchangeControlCount.description: Count either of the number of messages or, if used, of the number of functional groups in an interchange.
interchangeControlCount.title: Interchange Control Count

interchangeControlReference.description: Unique reference assigned by the sender to an interchange.
interchangeControlReference.title: Interchange Control Reference
